message.body: Angpants
Yay!!
I got confirmation that she indeed was stealing

I'm gonna keep an eye on my cash fri n sat. If anything weird happens, I'll ask a manager to check the transfer log n compare. I removed my number from the list tho. I wonder if she wrote it down or memorized it.
How did they catch her?
I caught her ringing under her own number on a pool night. I transfered it to the mutual cocktail server and corrected her. Just thought she wad dumb :/
Hey I am really uncomfortable about this. What are your feelings about going to management?
Hey sorry. I'm in the middle of a lunch rush. Let me catch up with you in an hour or so?
K sorry :)
Sorry darling
We were slammed
And I just woke up from a nap

They caught her because she was transferring shit to other people's number and cashing it out under their name. She also transferred it to a managers number. She also made the mistake of saying...OMG I had 2 tables today who's checks were both exactly 40.00 on the head....then one server was short exactly 80.00
No it's good. Ive cooled down
There were a lot of occurrences like that, and management put two and two together
Lol. What do u think about alerting them?
Definitely keep track this weekend...if we build our own evidence we'd make a great defense team
Well how's Josh's relationship with Kyle
I just don't want to start shit
Josh is probably the only one I trust talking to
I think it would be best to go to phil actually bc he has a sneaky mind, lol. But we can wait n see what happens this weekend. My number is down tho...
But josh would definitely listen and believe u or me
Phil just knows the computers really well
Well then we can let josh go to Phil if that's the case
K
